article: differences over policy on the iraq war ignited an explosion of angry words and personal insults on the house floor friday , when the chamber 's newest member suggested that a decorated war veteran was a coward for calling for an immediate withdrawal of u.s. troops .
abstract: house gop pushes vote on troop withdrawal ;
